#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,k,no,i,j,n;
	bool a[1001][1002];
	cin>>t;
	while (t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>k;
		for (i=0;i<n;i++) for (j=1;j<=k;j++) a[i][j]=false;
		for (i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>no;
			if (i==0)
			{
				a[i][no]=true;
				continue;
			}
			for (j=1;j<=k;j++) a[i][j]=a[i-1][j];
			for (j=1;j<=max(0,k-no);j++)
			{
				if (a[i-1][j])
					a[i][j+no]=true;
			}
			if (no<=k)
			a[i][no]=true;
		}
		cout<<a[n-1][k]<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
